Germany: King Chlodio of the Salian Franks died. Chlodio's son Merovech became king of the Salian Franks with the support of the Western Roman dux Flavius Aetius.
Indinesia: Several stone inscriptions were created in West Java. Among other the Tugu inscription announce decrees of Purnavarman, the king of Tarumanagara, one of the earliest Hindu kingdom in Java. (to 669)
Italy: Theodosius the Younger died in a riding accident.
